data_table.description: Medication Survey Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRF1
